nodes.text: A Shield gauntlet was a type of armored gauntlet. A shield gauntlet consisted of a metallic gauntlet that contained a number of thin metal plates; when activated an articulated servo-joint would snap the metal plates outward, creating a metal fan that could be used as a physical shield.
Enfys Nest made use of a pair of shield gauntlets that used Beskar metal plates, and used them to great effect to shield her from blaster fire.
